error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'books_returned_wednesday' (35) was used instead of 'books_withdrawn_thursday' (15).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 130
On Tuesday, 120 books were taken out 250 - 120 = <<250-120=130>>130 books
On Wednesday, 35 books were returned 130 + 35 = <<130+35=165>>165 books
On Thursday, 35 books were borrowed 165 - 35 = 130 books
